extensionDescription.message: Effortlessly manage your browser extensions with advanced grouping, profiling, and control features.

offlineBannerMessage.message: You appear to be offline or experiencing connection issues.

modalIntroText.message: This message indicates a potential problem with your internet connection. Here are common steps to try:

step1.message: Check Your Connection: Ensure you are connected to the correct Wi-Fi or your Ethernet cable is plugged in.

step2.message: Restart Equipment: Turn off your router and modem for 30 seconds, then turn them back on.

step3.message: Reload Page: A simple refresh can fix temporary glitches. Press F5 or Cmd+R.

step4.message: Test Other Sites: See if you can access other websites like google.com.

step5.message: Disable VPN/Proxy: Temporarily turn off any VPN or proxy services you're using.

step6.message: Firewall/Antivirus: Check your security software to ensure it's not blocking your browser.

step7.message: Restart Computer: A full system restart can resolve many underlying issues.
